h2_title: Where to use the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet in Black Myth: Wukong
content: With the Pellet in your inventory, you can head back to Chen Loong and give it to him. He will then let you access the Zodiac Realm in The New West, by giving you the Ruyi Scroll").
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Special-made_Bone-Strengthening_Pellet.md', within the main section titled 'Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
With the Pellet in your inventory, you can head back to Chen Loong and give it to him. He will then let you access the Zodiac Realm in The New West, by giving you the Ruyi Scroll").
